title: Ethereum Rival Solana Is Back—Experts Say It's No Surprise
description: Stablecoins, Shopify, and a simplified developer experience are fueling SOL’s rise.

title: World Tokenization Summit Returns for Second Edition: Focused on Real World Asset Tokenization in Dubai
description: Dubai, UAE – November 7, 2023 – The World Tokenization Summit, after its highly successful inaugural event, proudly announces the return of its second edition scheduled for November 21,  2023, in Dubai. This distinguished summit, centred on Real World Asset (RWA) tokenization, is set to provide an unmatched platform for industry leaders, innovators, and experts ... Read more

title: Turkey’s First Blockchain-Metaverse Expo Fair to be Held in Istanbul
description: The Blockchain technologies fair will be held in Istanbul for the first time at the Istanbul Fair Center from July 4-7, 2024. All stakeholders in the sector will meet in Istanbul for the first time at this fair. The “Blockchain Expo World” will host all stakeholders in the Metaverse, Cryptocurrency, NFT, WEB 3.0, Web 2, ... title: What Does Half a Billion Dollars AI Investment in Aleph Alpha Signify?
description: In a resounding move towards bolstering the landscape of artificial intelligence, Hewlett Packard Pathfinder, the venture capital arm of HPE, has spearheaded a consortium that injected over half a billion dollars into Aleph Alpha, a German Generative AI company.  This substantial investment, joined by SAP, Bosch Ventures, and Schwarz Group, not only signifies the financial ...
